thread.title: BRIEF-United Advertising to issue 6.5 mln shares with tentative issue price at T$46 per share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United Advertising to issue 6.5 mln shares with tentative issue price at T$46 per share
text:
Feb 27(Reuters) - United Advertising Co Ltd
* Says it plans to issue 6.5 million shares, with par value of T$10 per share and tentative issue price at T$46 per share
* 650,000 of the new shares to be offered to the companyâ€™s employees and remaining 5.85 million shares to be offered through public offering
* Says record date on March 21
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/U6xTM2
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
